answers.answer: I'm currently 33wks and 4 days.  I had my baby shower on Saturday. I'm also high risk, I had to get a cerclage at 20wks and I also was diagnosed with gestational diabetes. My advice to u would be to take it easy and don't worry too much. Just listen to what ur doctor say and make sure ure hydrated at all times. I wish u all the best, just take it easy and don't stress too much.

I'm trying not to.I just didn't think of it until now...How are your sugars?are you controlled with diet or your on insulin?Sorry off topic but your the first person who has a similar situation to me just further along! So awesome
I try to control it by dieting, it's not easy but I have to do it for the lil one. I have to check my sugar two hours after every meal.

That's good I had to take insulin so I'm on one before meals and another insulin before bedtime .My specialist has me checking after an hr of every meal under 120 its tough! Before the insulin I would be high after the hr but two hrs be normal.Lucky you with two hrs check but as long as our babies are healthy
I'm sorry to hear that u have to use insulin. Hang in there we're almost there.
Thank you best luck to you !I'm going to remember you.Plz tell me how your labour goes when your little one comes (:Through this post I'll be checking up (:

I have GD, but I able control it by diet. I fear insulin cause I don't think I stick myself with a needle.  I had GD with my last pregnancy to control by diet.  Dr said both times if I can't control my super by diet then insulin it be. Yikes!  So i rather give up sugars and sertain foods and limit my intake. I'll make 36 weeks be 37 on 28th Tuesday.  Stay strong ok :) hope you have a healthy baby.
Thank you I hate the insulin but whatever helps my healthy baby

question: I'm high risk with gestational diabetes & with an incompetent cervix so I have a cerclauge.My due date is July 22.Currently 27 wks.I'm planning my Babyshower for June 13 I will be 34 weeks and 4 days on that day.My concerns/worry is what can go wrong like me going into labour early ?I'm hoping I don't and everything goes smoothly ....Tomorrow I see my specialist and cardiologist. I've already Began seeing my ob every 3 wks....Any help other people similar stories are welcome and thank u in advance
title: my concern/ worry my high risk situation
